## Events.PackageDeclineEvent interface

A recipient has declined to sign a package, and has specified a reason for doing so. The Originating System can use that reason to determine the next step for the package.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface PackageDeclineEvent 
```

## Remarks

- [Setting Up Callback Notifications (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/feature-guides/developer/setting-callback-notifications)
